heading: Objective
body: Use a structured, low-pressure manager turn to clarify truth, resolve concerns, and align next steps—so the guest feels supported and the deal stays clean.

heading: Manager Close Promise
body: We do not overpower. We clarify. Calm tone + direct truth + simple options + one clean ask.
bullets: Calm tone|Unshakable facts|Two options max|One ask
notes: Use as a top callout card.

heading: Cognitive Load
body: Stalls often come from mental overload. Reduce choices, tighten the next step, and confirm comfort.

heading: Diagnose the Category
body: Before solving, identify: question, concern, objection, or misalignment.

heading: Unshakable Facts
body: Facts are anchors, not weapons. Share them to increase clarity and safety.
notes: Tie to Mike White culture language.

heading: One Clean Ask
body: End with one clear question and one next step.
bullets: If we can… are you comfortable…?

heading: Clean Handoff
body: The manager turn should not feel like trouble. Consultant sets it up as support.

heading: Planner
body: A simple worksheet to diagnose, summarize facts, present two options, and end with one ask.
